data.text:
Robert Ford

Coaching Record

Years Coached Record Win % Playoff record Playoff win % 16 154-102-0 60.16% 15-7 68.18%

Biography

Career Summary

Robert Ford was a football coach in the National Football League (NFL) from 1989 to 2006, finishing his career as the offensive quality control coach of the Oakland Raiders. Over his sixteen years of coaching his teams compiled a cumulative win/loss record of 154-102-0.
